item.title: Fox to stream Super Bowl for free on Tubi for the first time
item.description: A second stream on Tubi will feature the "Tubi Red Carpet" hosted by Olivia Culpo from the Superdome in New Orleans.

item.title: Judgment in Trump fraud case stands at $502 million before inauguration
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump will likely owe the state of New York about half a billion dollars when he's sworn in as president.

item.title: Many U.S. adults doubt Trump will be able to bring down costs
item.description: Many U.S. adults are skeptical about President-elect Donald Trump's ability to bring down costs.
